issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1) Install the upPortrait app on device  
2) Hold device upside down and launch app  
3) Hold the device in portrait mode  
4) Hold the device so that the top is pointing right  
5) Hold the device so that the top is pointing left  
6) Close app  
Orientation- upsideDownOnly App crashes on launching it to iphone
fields.summary: Splash Screen Orientation 2004 Test upside down orientation on iphone is crashing on launch

comments.body: Tested with iPhone 4 (4.3.5) and iPod Touch (4.0.2) with 2.0.0.v20120318203256 not encountering the crash

It is still crashing here with iphone4. Below are the logs I get :

Wed Mar 21 15:08:48 unknown ReportCrash[2018] <Notice>: Formulating crash report for process upsideDownOnly[2017]
Wed Mar 21 15:08:48 unknown kernel[0] <Debug>: launchd[2017] Builtin profile: container (sandbox)
Wed Mar 21 15:08:48 unknown kernel[0] <Debug>: launchd[2017] Container: /private/var/mobile/Applications/F46F8A37-CF72-41A8-9B9A-1A4B0B1E6B9A [69] (sandbox)
Wed Mar 21 15:08:48 unknown ReportCrash[2018] <Error>: Saved crashreport to /var/mobile/Library/Logs/CrashReporter/upsideDownOnly_2012-03-21-150847_sumeetsaxenas-iPhone.plist using uid: 0 gid: 0, synthetic_euid: 501 egid: 0
Wed Mar 21 15:08:48 unknown com.apple.launchd[1] <Warning>: (UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.upsidedownonly[0x2d45]) Job appears to have crashed: Bus error
Wed Mar 21 15:08:48 unknown com.apple.launchd[1] <Warning>: (UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.upsidedownonly[0x2d45]) Throttling respawn: Will start in 2147483647 seconds
Wed Mar 21 15:08:48 unknown SpringBoard[30] <Warning>: Application 'upsideDownOnly' exited abnormally with signal 10: Bus error
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown /bin/poc-bbot[2012] <Debug>: IIIIIII Just want to tell you how im feeling
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown /bin/poc-bbot[2012] <Debug>: awoadqdoqjdqjwiodjqoi aaah!
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown /bin/poc-bbot[2012] <Debug>: Checking out the local scene yo
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown com.ikey.bbot[2012] <Notice>: cp: 
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown com.ikey.bbot[2012] <Notice>: cannot stat `/var/log/youcanbeclosertogod.jpg'
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown com.ikey.bbot[2012] <Notice>: : No such file or directory
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown com.ikey.bbot[2012] <Notice>: No matching processes were found
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown ReportCrash[2018] <Notice>: Formulating crash report for process poc-bbot[2012]
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown com.apple.launchd[1] <Warning>: (com.ikey.bbot) Job appears to have crashed: Bus error
Wed Mar 21 15:08:50 unknown ReportCrash[2018] <Error>: Saved crashreport to /Library/Logs/CrashReporter/poc-bbot_2012-03-21-150850_sumeetsaxenas-iPhone.plist using uid: 0 gid: 0, synthetic_euid: 0 egid: 0

The device needs to be replaced. It's 1: jailbroken and 2: has a virus. One can tell because there's a process called poc-bbot in the logs, and it tries to rickroll you. Explanation at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4IK-Mk3V8Ts

Marking as invalid.
